findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: Unprotected Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient access control, allowing non-whitelisted wallets to make transactions.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom functionality allowing non-whitelisted wallets to transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: Burn Fee Percent
findings.description: The setBurnFeePercent function allows the owner to set a burn fee percentage.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: sync
findings.description: The 'sync' function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: _approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in _approve function.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transfer function

findings.title: swapTokens
findings.description: Private function swapTokens has a lockTheSwap restriction.

findings.title: swapTokensForEth
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapTokensForEth function

findings.title: addLiquidity
findings.description: External function addLiquidity has a critical issue.

findings.title: _tokenTransfer
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _tokenTransfer function allowing unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: _transferStandard
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: _transferToExcluded
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transferToExcluded function

findings.title: _transferFromExcluded
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transferFromExcluded function allowing excluded addresses to transfer tokens.

findings.title: _transferBothExcluded
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: _reflectFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a potential vulnerability as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: Unprotected Function: includeInReward
findings.description: The 'includeInReward' function does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential manipulation of rewards.
